course_title: Community Transformation: A Five-day Experiential Workshop on Partnerships and Empowerment
class_notes: 4 1/2 days in-person instruction: March 25 Friday 5-8pm; March 26 & 27 Saturday & Sunday 8:30am - 5:00pm; April 2 &3 Saturday & Sunday 8:30am - 5:00pm. This course requires pre-assignments. Open to Global Health, Global Environmental Health, Global Epidemiology, and learners in other Emory Schools/Departments committed to community development.
course_description: A pre-assignment is required. Through participatory learning, this course introduces a process that can be used to help communities identify and reflect on their key issues and take action. Additionally, it expands the understanding of methods for community empowerment and facilitates through group exercise and reflection approaches to the community empowerment process.
